articles.title: Real incomes shrink as wages growth of 0.7% in March quarter falls behind inflation - The Guardian
articles.description: Labor says figures released by the ABS show gap between wage growth and cost of living increases in Australia is now the largest in more than two decades
articles.content:
Australian wage growth barely budged in the March quarter, with salaries increasing at less than half the headline inflation rate, stoking concerns pay packets continue to shrink in real terms.

articles.description: You can now take your PlayStation V-Bucks with you to versions of Fortnite on other platforms, as the last of PlayStation's walled garden crumbles.
articles.content:
